# corclus

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tessaleejohnson/corclus")
```

This R package was developed to manage the _Multiple Membership with Correlated Clusters_ simulation study:

* Johnson, T. L., Feng, Y., Stapleton, L. M. (_Working Paper_). The effect of correlated clusters on parameter estimates in multiple membership models
